name: jsPacman
description: HTML5 / JavaScript DOM based remake of the classic Ms Pac-Man game

scripts.build: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack
scripts.demo:publish: npm run test && npm run build && cp CNAME ./dist/ && cd dist && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update demo' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -m 'Update demo' && git push git@github.com:8tentaculos/jsPacman.git gh-pages --force

author: Alberto Masuelli <alberto.masuelli@gmail.com> (https://github.com/8tentaculos)
